page.title: 10Travelling by Train.
page.content: I travel to school most days by train with a small group of children from school.We get a{free pass}from Hampshire Ed.Auth.because we go to a Catholic School and there is only one in the area. I catch the 8.21a.m. from Netley and it takes just about 7mins.to get to Woolston.After school I catch the 3.36pm.back. In the morning the train will not be very full but sometimes in the evening {I can't find a seat. The train is not very modern.You sit on upholstered bench seats facing each other and there is only one toilet for the whole train.There is{Graffiti}on the inside walls of the carriage and some of it is not very nice. I enjoy travelling by train,though, because it is somehow{more exciting than car or bus.
